_comment: for the documentation about the tasks.json format

tasks.label: sync
tasks.command: git add -A;if ($?){git commit -m 'change text'};$commitFlag=$?;git pull --no-edit ;if ($? -and $commitFlag) {git push}

tasks.label: synclinux
tasks.command: git add -A && git commit -m 'change text' ; commitFlag=$? ; git pull --no-edit && if [ $commitFlag -eq 0 ]; then git push; fi
